page.title: 18A Cockermouth Family.
page.content: There are five people in my family,my dad, my mum and my two brothers called Simon and Thomas.My dad works at an open cast coal site.In his spare time he likes to go fell walking on the mountains with Simon and I but he cant take Thomas yet because he is only two. Mum does'nt work so you could call her a houswife. One of the things she likes doing is working in the garden.Simon is ten years old.He spends a lot of time playing on his bike and playing with Lego.Thomas my other brother is two years old and loves Roland Rat. In the morning Thomas gets out of his cot and wakes me up. At the moment we are potty training him it is working a bit but he usually tells mum that he wants to go on the potty when he's done it in his pants.
